title: Cinderella Reflex, The - Buchanan, Johanna.epub
description:
Ever think everyone else has their life sorted except you?
ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s how Tess Morgan feels when she finally returns from her big trip around the world. Because while sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been blissed out in Bali, her peers have been climbing the career ladder.
Turning thirty,Tess thinks maybe itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s finally time for her to do the same.
But her job as a radio producer feel less like a sturdy foot on the career ladder and more like a stepping stone to disaster as Tess struggles with the demands of the megalomaniac presenter of Ã¢â‚¬ËœThis MorningÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Ollie Andrews and her neurotic boss Helene Harper.
Helene has problems of her own. Ten years older than Tess, both her relationship and career have taken a wrong turning into a not very pleasant cul-de-sac.
Things go from bad to worse for both women when the struggling radio station is suddenly bought over by mogul Jack McCabe, who immediately launches a competition for a new star at Atlantic 1 FM. Soon, nerves are frayed and friendships strained as everyone battles to keep their jobs. Tess gets back in touch with the ex she thinks of as The One who got away. Helene tries to to pull strings with her influential lover.
But will Tess learn that there's only one show worth rescuing?
And how will Helene cope with her next, very unexpected production?
Genre: Fiction, Romance
